videos.description: Kyle Guy comes off a screen and knocks down a shot from beyond the arc for the first points of the game.
videos.headline: Guy's triple gets Virginia on the board

videos.description: Shelton Mitchell drives into the lane and dishes to Aamir Simms who drains the corner 3 to put the Tigers ahead 23-16.
videos.headline: Simms' 3-ball extends Clemson's lead

videos.description: Gabe DeVoe blows past his defender, drives to the rack and finishes with an easy reverse lay-in as part of a 9-0 Clemson run.
videos.headline: DeVoe slices down lane for Tigers' score

videos.description: The Cavaliers show off their interior passing as Isaiah Wilkins backs down his defender and bounces a sweet pass to Jack Salt for an uncontested dunk.
videos.headline: Wilkins drops dime to set up Virginia slam

videos.description: With the clock winding down in the first half, Cavaliers guard Devon Hall drives to the hoop and banks home a tough layup to give Virginia a 27-23 halftime lead.
videos.headline: Virginia beats 1st-half buzzer

videos.description: Jack Salt goes to work in the post, getting his defender to bite on a pump fake then sinking a lefty hook shot.
videos.headline: Salt breaks out sweet post move for Virginia basket

videos.description: Kyle Guy gets the Cavaliers' faithful on its feet after nailing his second triple of the night, giving Virginia a double-digit lead in the process.
videos.headline: Guy's 3 ignites Virginia crowd

videos.description: Mamadi Diakite picks the pocket of Clemson's Clyde Trapp then finishes on the break with a one-handed slam, extending Virginia's lead to 22 points.
videos.headline: Cavaliers pour it on with Diakite's steal and slam
